bibl.seg: FRASER Peter Marshall and Elaine MATTHEWS (Edd.), with the collaboration of many scholars, A Lexicon of Greek Personal Names. Volume VA. Coastal Asia Minor: Pontos to Ionia. Editor: Thomas CORSTEN, Assistant Editor: Richard W.V. CATLING, Associate Editor: Marijana RICL.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 2010, 4°, xxxviii-496 pp. ISBN 978-0-19-956743-0. £131.
